name: Alex
descr: Amazing selection of artists – I keep discovering new music every day!

name: Maria
descr: Nice UI and easy filters. It feels like a real streaming app, but focused on discovery.

name: John
descr: Love the artist details and mini‑player. It is super easy to dive into full albums.

name: Nika
descr: The dark theme, typography, and micro‑interactions all look very polished.

name: Oleh
descr: Filters by genre and name work great – I quickly found a bunch of new indie bands.
